languages.text: "Наконец, Карроций Бледный... древний гемункул, предавший Эзирраеш ради иного кабала. Это была не военная, а личная победа. В своих попытках стать неуязвимым он вшил в себя самых смертоносных тварей, каких можно было найти в недрах Комморры. Ему это не помогло — я вырезал все его восемь сердец, которые затем отослал в его бывший ковен — в назидание другим".

"And lastly, Carrocius the Pale... He was an ancient Haemonculus who betrayed the Aezyrraesh at the behest of another Kabal. That was not a military victory but a personal one. In his attempts to make himself invincible, Carrocius had sewn inside himself the deadliest creatures from the depths of Commorragh. It did not save him — I cut out every one of his eight hearts and sent them to his former Coven as a warning to the rest."
languages.original_text: "Наконец, Карроций Бледный... древний гемункул, предавший Эзирраеш ради иного кабала. Это была не военная, а личная победа. В своих попытках стать неуязвимым он вшил в себя самых смертоносных тварей, каких можно было найти в недрах Комморры. Ему это не помогло — я вырезал все его восемь сердец, которые затем отослал в его бывший ковен — в назидание другим".

In his attempts to make himself invincible, Carrocius had sewn inside himself the deadliest creatures from the depths of Commorragh. It did not save him — I cut out every one of his eight hearts and sent them to his former Coven as a warning to the rest."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

In his attempts to make himself invincible, Carrocius had sewn inside himself the deadliest creatures from the depths of Commorragh. It did not save him — I cut out every one of his eight hearts and sent them to his former Coven as a warning to the rest."

In his attempts to make himself invincible, Carrocius had sewn inside himself the deadliest creatures from the depths of Commorragh. It did not save him — I cut out every one of his eight hearts and sent them to his former Coven as a warning to the rest."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

traits.locale_text: "And lastly, Carrocius the Pale... He was an ancient Haemonculus who betrayed the Aezyrraesh at the behest of another Kabal. That was not a military victory but a personal one. In his attempts to make himself invincible, Carrocius had sewn inside himself the deadliest creatures from the depths of Commorragh. It did not save him — I cut out every one of his eight hearts and sent them to his former Coven as a warning to the rest."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: «Por último, Carrocius el Pálido... fue un anciano Hemónculo que traicionó a los Aezyrraesh por orden de otra Kábala. No fue una victoria militar sino personal. En sus esfuerzos por ser invencible, Carrocius había cosido en su interior a las criaturas más letales de las profundidades de Commorragh. No fue suficiente... le arranqué los ocho corazones de uno en uno y se los envié a su anterior Cónclave como advertencia a los demás».
languages.original_text: "And lastly, Carrocius the Pale... He was an ancient Haemonculus who betrayed the Aezyrraesh at the behest of another Kabal. That was not a military victory but a personal one. In his attempts to make himself invincible, Carrocius had sewn inside himself the deadliest creatures from the depths of Commorragh. It did not save him — I cut out every one of his eight hearts and sent them to his former Coven as a warning to the rest."

traits.locale_text: «Por último, Carrocius el Pálido... fue un anciano Hemónculo que traicionó a los Aezyrraesh por orden de otra Kábala. No fue una victoria militar sino personal. En sus esfuerzos por ser invencible, Carrocius había cosido en su interior a las criaturas más letales de las profundidades de Commorragh. No fue suficiente... le arranqué los ocho corazones de uno en uno y se los envié a su anterior Cónclave como advertencia a los demás».
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: “至于最后这个称号，苍白者卡洛西斯……他是位古老的血伶人，在其他阴谋团的授意下，背叛了艾泽拉什家族。那并不是军事胜利，而是我个人的胜利。为了让自己战无不胜，卡洛西斯把科摩罗深处最致命的生物缝合在他自己身上，但即便如此，他依然难逃一死。我把他的八颗心脏都挖了出来，送到了他以前的密会，以儆效尤。”
languages.original_text: "And lastly, Carrocius the Pale... He was an ancient Haemonculus who betrayed the Aezyrraesh at the behest of another Kabal. That was not a military victory but a personal one. In his attempts to make himself invincible, Carrocius had sewn inside himself the deadliest creatures from the depths of Commorragh. It did not save him — I cut out every one of his eight hearts and sent them to his former Coven as a warning to the rest."

traits.locale_text: “至于最后这个称号，苍白者卡洛西斯……他是位古老的血伶人，在其他阴谋团的授意下，背叛了艾泽拉什家族。那并不是军事胜利，而是我个人的胜利。为了让自己战无不胜，卡洛西斯把科摩罗深处最致命的生物缝合在他自己身上，但即便如此，他依然难逃一死。我把他的八颗心脏都挖了出来，送到了他以前的密会，以儆效尤。”
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: 「そして最後に青白きカロシウス…他の陰謀団の命令でアエジレシュを裏切った古代のハモンキュラスだ。あれは軍としての勝利ではなく、個人の勝利だった。カロシウスは自身を無敵にするべく、コモラフの奥深くにいる世にも恐ろしい生物を自分の中に縫い付けたんだ。だがそれで奴が救われることはなかった。俺は奴の8つの心臓を一つ一つ切り取って、残りのものたちへの警告として、かつての盟約団に送ってやったんだ」
languages.original_text: "And lastly, Carrocius the Pale... He was an ancient Haemonculus who betrayed the Aezyrraesh at the behest of another Kabal. That was not a military victory but a personal one. In his attempts to make himself invincible, Carrocius had sewn inside himself the deadliest creatures from the depths of Commorragh. It did not save him — I cut out every one of his eight hearts and sent them to his former Coven as a warning to the rest."

traits.locale_text: 「そして最後に青白きカロシウス…他の陰謀団の命令でアエジレシュを裏切った古代のハモンキュラスだ。あれは軍としての勝利ではなく、個人の勝利だった。カロシウスは自身を無敵にするべく、コモラフの奥深くにいる世にも恐ろしい生物を自分の中に縫い付けたんだ。だがそれで奴が救われることはなかった。俺は奴の8つの心臓を一つ一つ切り取って、残りのものたちへの警告として、かつての盟約団に送ってやったんだ」
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: « Quant à Carrocius le Blafard, c'était un ancien hémoncule ayant trahi les Aezyrraesh sur ordre d'une autre Kabale. En l'occurrence, ce ne fut pas une victoire militaire, mais personnelle. Cherchant à se rendre invincible, Carrocius avait transplanté en son sein les créatures les plus meurtrières dont les profondeurs de Commorragh avaient accouché. Ça ne l'a pas sauvé pour autant... Je lui ai arraché un à un ses huit cœurs avant de les envoyer à sa coterie en guise d'avertissement pour ses congénères. »
languages.original_text: "And lastly, Carrocius the Pale... He was an ancient Haemonculus who betrayed the Aezyrraesh at the behest of another Kabal. That was not a military victory but a personal one. In his attempts to make himself invincible, Carrocius had sewn inside himself the deadliest creatures from the depths of Commorragh. It did not save him — I cut out every one of his eight hearts and sent them to his former Coven as a warning to the rest."

traits.locale_text: « Quant à Carrocius le Blafard, c'était un ancien hémoncule ayant trahi les Aezyrraesh sur ordre d'une autre Kabale. En l'occurrence, ce ne fut pas une victoire militaire, mais personnelle. Cherchant à se rendre invincible, Carrocius avait transplanté en son sein les créatures les plus meurtrières dont les profondeurs de Commorragh avaient accouché. Ça ne l'a pas sauvé pour autant... Je lui ai arraché un à un ses huit cœurs avant de les envoyer à sa coterie en guise d'avertissement pour ses congénères. »
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: "Und zuletzt, Carrocius der Blasse ... Er war ein uralter Haemonculus, der die Aezyrraesh auf Geheiß einer anderen Kabale hin verraten hat. Das war kein militärischer Sieg, sondern ein persönlicher. In dem Versuch, sich unbesiegbar zu machen, hatte Carrocius die tödlichsten Kreaturen aus den Tiefen Commorraghs in seinen Körper eingenäht. Es hat ihn nicht gerettet. Ich habe jedes einzelne seiner acht Herzen herausgeschnitten und sie an seinen ehemaligen Zirkel geschickt, als Warnung an die Übrigen."
languages.original_text: "And lastly, Carrocius the Pale... He was an ancient Haemonculus who betrayed the Aezyrraesh at the behest of another Kabal. That was not a military victory but a personal one. In his attempts to make himself invincible, Carrocius had sewn inside himself the deadliest creatures from the depths of Commorragh. It did not save him — I cut out every one of his eight hearts and sent them to his former Coven as a warning to the rest."

traits.locale_text: "Und zuletzt, Carrocius der Blasse ... Er war ein uralter Haemonculus, der die Aezyrraesh auf Geheiß einer anderen Kabale hin verraten hat. Das war kein militärischer Sieg, sondern ein persönlicher. In dem Versuch, sich unbesiegbar zu machen, hatte Carrocius die tödlichsten Kreaturen aus den Tiefen Commorraghs in seinen Körper eingenäht. Es hat ihn nicht gerettet. Ich habe jedes einzelne seiner acht Herzen herausgeschnitten und sie an seinen ehemaligen Zirkel geschickt, als Warnung an die Übrigen."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.original_text: "And lastly, Carrocius the Pale... He was an ancient Haemonculus who betrayed the Aezyrraesh at the behest of another Kabal. That was not a military victory but a personal one. In his attempts to make himself invincible, Carrocius had sewn inside himself the deadliest creatures from the depths of Commorragh. It did not save him — I cut out every one of his eight hearts and sent them to his former Coven as a warning to the rest."

languages.text: "Kansız Carrocius'a gelecek olursak... O da başka bir Kabal'a kanıp Aezyrraesh'e ihanet etmiş, kadim bir Haimonkulus'tu. Bunu askerîden ziyade şahsi bir zafer sayabiliriz. Carrocius... Ölümsüz olacağım diye Commorragh'ın derinliklerindeki en ölümcül yaratıkları kendi içine hapsetmişti. Fakat pek bir faydasını göremedi. Sekiz kalbini de tek tek çıkardım, akıllarını başlarına alsınlar diye eski meclisine yolladım."
languages.original_text: "And lastly, Carrocius the Pale... He was an ancient Haemonculus who betrayed the Aezyrraesh at the behest of another Kabal. That was not a military victory but a personal one. In his attempts to make himself invincible, Carrocius had sewn inside himself the deadliest creatures from the depths of Commorragh. It did not save him — I cut out every one of his eight hearts and sent them to his former Coven as a warning to the rest."

traits.locale_text: "Kansız Carrocius'a gelecek olursak... O da başka bir Kabal'a kanıp Aezyrraesh'e ihanet etmiş, kadim bir Haimonkulus'tu. Bunu askerîden ziyade şahsi bir zafer sayabiliriz. Carrocius... Ölümsüz olacağım, diye Commorragh derinliklerinin en ölümcül yaratıklarını kendi içine hapsetmişti ama pek bir faydasını göremedi. Sekiz kalbini de tek tek çıkardım, akıllarını başlarına alsınlar diye eski meclisine yolladım."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion
